TextView.android:text: Located along Tapti River, Surat Marriott Hotel features an outdoor pool, spa and gym. It is just 2 km from shopping in Parle Point, Ghod Dod Road and Piplo. Free parking is provided. Free WiFi is available. Soundproofed rooms are fitted with a personal safe, tea/coffee-making facilities and minibar. A hairdryer and radio are provided. Surat Marriott Hotel is 7 km from Textile and Diamond Market and 10 km from Surat Airport. Surat Railway Station is 12 km away. Guests can spend their recreation time in the hotel’s salon or shopping arcade. A business centre and tour desk are available. Currency exchange, fax and photocopying services are offered.

8 km from Mayank Aquaculture, Hotel Amisha International is situated in Surat and features air-conditioned rooms. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel has family rooms. The units in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The rooms have a private bathroom, slippers and bed linen. Hotel Amisha International offers a continental or à la carte breakfast.

Courtyard by Marriott Surat in Surat features a terrace. Featuring a restaurant, hotel has air-conditioned rooms each with a private bathroom. The units at the hotel are equipped with a seating area and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Courtyard by Marriott Surat offers certain rooms that include a balcony, and each room has a kettle. The rooms will provide guests with an oven. All bathrooms feature shower cubicles equipped with exotic rain showers and luxurious fittings. Extras include bathrobes, slippers and free toiletries. A buffet breakfast can be enjoyed in the breakfast area. Guests can enjoy a meal at The Bistro, serving international cuisine alongside regional specialities or visit the 24 hour Café CoCo for a coffee. The accommodation offers an outdoor pool. Car rentals and day trips can be arranged at the Front desk. The hotel also provides express laundry services and a 24-hour front desk. Airport shuttles are available for an extra fee. A business centre, newspapers and luggage storage service are available on site.
